actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Reported to House from the Committee on Public Works and Transportation, H. Rept. 95-1099.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to rename two lakes which have been completed as part of the Papillion Creek Basin project as the Glenn Cunningham Lake and the Standing Bear Lake.

summary.text: Renames the Irvington Lake and Military Lake (part of the Papillion Creek basin project) as the Glenn Cunningham Lake and Standing Bear Lake, respectively.

titles.title: A bill to rename two lakes which have been completed as part of the Papillion Creek Basin project as the Glenn Cunningham Lake and the Standing Bear Lake.
